name: cost
description: The production or acquisition cost of the product

name: category
description: The category classification of the product

name: name
description: The full name of the product

name: brand
description: The brand name of the product

name: retail_price
description: The price at which the product is sold to customers

name: department
description: The department the product belongs to (e.g., Men, Women)

name: distribution_center_id
description: Identifier for the distribution center housing the product
